Former Sooners and current Philadelphia Eagles quarterback Jalen Hurts will be inactive for the regularseason finale against the Dallas Cowboys on Saturday evening the team announced PERIOD

DALvsPHI inactives pic.twitter.comeY5Ro6ykXD

With a wildcard spot clinched at  it appears that the Eagles dont want to risk any unnecessary injuries to their starting quarterback a week before the playoffs so they intend to rest him against Dallas PERIOD After starting the season  in their first seven games the Eagles went  in their next nine contests which includes a current fourgame winning streak PERIOD

Hurts sitting out Week  means the 23yearold finishes his second season with  passing yards on a . completion percentage with  passing touchdowns and nine interceptions PERIOD On the ground Hurts finished with  rushing yards on  carries and  rushing touchdowns PERIOD

Hurts rushing yard and touchdown totals both ranked first among NFL quarterbacks this season PERIOD Former OUoffensive lineman Lane Johnson is also among the  inactives Philadelphia is resting against Dallas PERIOD
